text: "Celluloid Heroes" is a 1972 song by British band The Kinks. It was taken from their 11th studio album Everybody's in Show-Biz. It also appears on their 1980 live album One for the Road. The song talks about famous 20th-century actors and the Hollywood Boulevard. title: Celluloid Heroes
